四胡: (しこ) - sihu (4-stringed Chinese musical instrument played with a bow)
四脚門: (よつあしもん) - style of temple gate featuring four supporting pillars and a gabled roof
四至: (しじ) - four sides (boundaries) of a property
四色定理: (よんしょくていり) - four-color theorem (colour) (theorem stating that any map can be colored such that no two adjacent segments have the same color, if only four colors are used)
四苦: (しく) - the four kinds of suffering (birth, old age, disease, death)
四苦八苦: (shikuhakku) - estar em grande aflição, estar em dificuldade; os quatro e oito tipos de sofrimento
四葉塩竈: (ヨツバシオガマ) - Chamisso's lousewort (Pedicularis chamissonis var. japonica)
四衆: (ししゅう) - four orders of Buddhist followers (monks, nuns, male lay devotees and female lay devotees); four monastic communities (ordained monks, ordained nuns, male novices and female novices); (in Tendai) the four assemblies
四角号碼: (しかくごうま) - four-corner kanji character stroke classification system
四角四面な人: (しかくしめんなひと) - prim (stuffy) person; squared-toed person
四角張る: (しかくばる) - to be angular; to be formal
四角羚羊: (ヨツヅノレイヨウ) - four-horned antelope (Tetracerus quadricornis); chousingha
四計: (しけい) - plans for one's day, plans for one's year, plans for one's life, and plans for one's family
四諦: (したい) - The Four Noble Truths (of Buddhism)
四象: (ししょう) - four images; four symbols; four emblems; four phenomena; four phases
四足獣: (しそくじゅう) - quadruped; four-footed animal
四輪駆動車: (よんりんくどうしゃ) - four-wheel-drive car
四辺形格子: (しへんけいこうし) - quadrilateral mesh
四通八達: (しつうはったつ) - (yoji) traffic network extending in all directions
四部衆: (しぶしゅ) - four orders of Buddhist followers (monks, nuns, male lay devotees and female lay devotees)
四重唱: (しじゅうしょう) - vocal quartet; four-part chorus
四重禁: (しじゅうごん) - four grave prohibitions (killing, theft, adultery, and deceit)
四阿: (あずまや) - arbor; arbour; bower; summer house; square gazebo
四隅: (しぐう) - four corners; four ordinal directions
四隣: (しりん) - whole neighborhood; whole neighbourhood; surrounding countries
四霊: (しれい) - the four auspicious beasts from Chinese mythology
四面楚歌: (しめんそか) - (yoji) being surrounded by enemies on all sides; being betrayed (forsaken) by everybody
四頭立ての馬車: (よんとうだてのばしゃ) - coach and four; four horse coach
四魔: (しま) - the four kinds of demons that make trouble for sentient beings
回: (kai/mawa) - times , counter for occurrences; a time, an instance; inning (baseball), round, game; episode, chapter, instalment
回し引きのこぎり: (まわしびきのこぎり) - bracket saw; sabre saw; saber saw
回し引き鋸: (まわしびきのこぎり) - bracket saw; sabre saw; saber saw
回し打ち: (まわしうち) - {mahj} discarding somewhat safe tiles while still trying to win a hand
回し読み: (まわしよみ) - reading a book in turn
回し蹴り: (まわしげり) - roundhouse kick; turning kick
回し飲み: (まわしのみ) - drinking in turn from one cup
回す: (まわす) - to turn/to rotate/to gyrate; to circulate/to send around; to surround; to put something to a new use (e.g. leftovers); (after the -masu stem of a verb) ... around (i.e. to chase someone around); to dial (e.g. telephone number); to invest; to gang-rape
回り: (まわり) - rotation; making the rounds; spreading; effect/efficacy; by way of/via; round/turn; size; 12-year period/12-year age difference
回りくどい: (まわりくどい) - circuitous; roundabout; indirect
回り出す: (まわりだす) - to begin to turn
回り合う: (めぐりあう) - to meet fortuitously (e.g. running into an old friend); to meet by chance; to happen across
回り合せ: (まわりあわせ) - turn of fortune; twist of fate
回り合わせ: (まわりあわせ) - turn of fortune; twist of fate
回り番: (まわりばん) - taking turns; working in shifts
回り込む: (まわりこむ) - to go round and cut in; to take a roundabout path
回る: (めぐる) - to go around; to return; to surround; to concern (usu. of disputes)
回を重ねる: (かいをかさねる) - to advance (as of a baseball game); to repeat
回付: (かいふ) - transmitting; referring to; passing on
回分: (かいぶん) - batch; times worth of/multiplier
回収: (かいしゅう) - collection; recovery; withdrawal; retrieval
回向: (えこう) - Buddhist memorial service; prayers for the repose of the soul
回向文: (えこうもん) - closing recital that transfers the merit of the service to a buddha, a bodhisattva, or the dead
回国: (かいこく) - traveling throughout the country (travelling)
回報: (かいほう) - circular; circulating letter; reply
回天: (かいてん) - changing the world/turning the tide; torpedo modified as a suicide weapon (used in WWII)
回峰行: (かいほうぎょう) - thousand-day walk through the mountains from Hieizan to the old Imperial Palace in Kyoto (ascetic practice of the Tendai sect)
